title: Disseminated talaromycosis with pulmonary tuberculosis coinfection in an immunocompromised patient mimicking disseminated histoplasmosis.
abstract: Opportunistic infections in patients with human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) can mimic each other, complicating diagnosis. Here, we report a rare case of disseminated
